steps.title: Make groans and give incomplete responses to the waker without opening your eyes.
steps.content: Make groans and give incomplete responses to the waker without opening your eyes.

steps.title: Squint your eyes (with or without light coming in the room) and rub them if you would like.
steps.content: Squint your eyes (with or without light coming in the room) and rub them if you would like.

steps.title: Once you become "conscious," put your hands up behind your head or to your cheeks and take in a deep breath with your nose only.
steps.content: Once you become "conscious," put your hands up behind your head or to your cheeks and take in a deep breath with your nose only. Upon letting air out, groan some more.

steps.title: Slowly look round at the waker, and groan again.
steps.content: Slowly look round at the waker, and groan again.

steps.title: Eventually, open your eyes wide and either lay there on your back/sit up in bed/or sit on the edge of the bed with your head down for about a minute.
steps.content: Eventually, open your eyes wide and either lay there on your back/sit up in bed/or sit on the edge of the bed with your head down for about a minute.

steps.title: While looking as if it were a painful task, make your way out of the bed and stretch upon getting out.
steps.content: While looking as if it were a painful task, make your way out of the bed and stretch upon getting out.

steps.title: Ask what time it is, and perhaps mumble to yourself
steps.content: Ask what time it is, and perhaps mumble to yourself

steps.title: If they turn on the light put the covers over your head and roll around and say "stop"
steps.content: If they turn on the light put the covers over your head and roll around and say "stop"

steps.title: To really fool them, put a tiny bit of black eye shadow under your eyes.
steps.content: To really fool them, put a tiny bit of black eye shadow under your eyes. This will prove that you "just woke up".

steps.title: Act tired in front of everyone, but not too tired or people may think you didn't get enough sleep.
steps.content: Act tired in front of everyone, but not too tired or people may think you didn't get enough sleep.

steps.title: Pretend to "light sleep".
steps.content: Pretend to " light sleep ". If someone woke you up at 6:00 in the morning, go to bed a little bit earlier to teach them not to wake you up so early (at least not on school days.)
